<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shield Salvation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1899) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49)

**Prerequisites**
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1895)

</column>

---

You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839), the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead. Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.
name: Shield Salvation
